meanings.definition: To surpass in shining or brightness.
meanings.sent1: The sun outshines the stars in the sky.
meanings.sent2: Her smile outshines all the other smiles in the room.
meanings.sent3: The flashlight outshines the glow-in-the-dark stickers.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse outshines the city lights on a foggy night.
meanings.sent5: The diamond outshines all the other gems with its sparkle.

meanings.definition: To surpass in excellence or beauty.
meanings.sent2: The talented singer outshines the rest of the performers.
meanings.sent3: His cooking outshines his ability to set the table.
meanings.sent4: The masterpiece painting outshines all the other artworks in the gallery.
meanings.sent5: The rare flower outshines the common ones with its vibrant colors.
